body.name: Noahcam 5g Light Bulb Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, 2K 360 PTZ WiFi Lightbulb Cameras for Home Secuity Outside Motion Detection Siren Alarm 24/7 Color Night Vision Two Way Talk Easy to Install
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 2K HD Color Day and Night Vision Light Bulb Camera 360: With 2K Ultra HD resolution, the lightbulb security camera provides superior image quality that see the details of your indoor/outdoor home(front door/backyard/garage) during the day and night. The Wireless security camera support 3MP super clearly sportlight color & infrared night vision mode. The bulb cameras for home security also features horizontal 355° and vertical 90° rotation, covering every detail to protection for your house.

Wireless & Super Easy Installation: This light bulb security camera outdoor is a truly 5g wireless camera, simply screw it into a normal E27 light socket (110V ~ 240V) and light socket camera is certified by ETL. Then download the EseeCloud mobile App, follow the in-app instruction to connect this bulb camera (Support 2.4GHz and 5GHz dual bands wifi). No other operations are required.

AI Motion Tracking Alerts 24/7 Recording: light socket security camera outdoor utilizes AI technology to intelligently track moving persons, pets, vehicles. When Humanoid Detection ON（Default Mode）: Intelligent AI human sensing algorithm can only capture the movement of people, so as to avoid small animals and avoids camera bulb unnecessary alarm notifications. The outside camera wireless can all day continuously record videos.

Two-Way Audio & Multi-Device & User Share: The wireless outdoor camera 5ghz enables you talk with you family or visitors with phone app. You can share the lightbulb cameras for home security with over 20 people and watch it simultaneously. Outdoor camera wireless compatible with Alexa. 5g surveillance camera and smartphone app EseeCloud are easy to Install, simple to control.

Optional Cloud & Local Storage: Wireless cameras for home security outdoor 5g supports 24/7 recording and automatically record video to a micro TF card (up to 128G, not included) or cloud storage (incls free trial period) when motion is detected. You can watch eagle eye camera 360 recorded videos in real-time through your mobile app and not miss important life moments. Any questions with eagleeye security camera, please contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to install universal camera with lots of good features!
reviews.reviewText: I have one Ring door bell camera and one Ring floodlight garage camera, which cost me $300+, and I have to pay $30 subscription fee per year per device. This light bulb camera is really cost effective and I just need to insert one micro SD card for local storage. Comparing to the ring cameras:1. It is super easy to install and setup(just replace the old bulb with it and pair using the downloaded free app in minutes). And you don't need to handle those fuzzy fire/neutral/ground wires.2. Its HD video is even clearer than my Ring cameras.3. It has a human tracking feature the Ring does not have.4. You can also enable the smart night vision and enable the white light warning function to make it work perfectly like a floodlight security camera(same as what my Ring floodlight garage camera does).5. It supports 2-way talking(same as what my Ring doorbell does).Anyway it not only has everything Ring products have(some features are smarter and better) but also provides a lot more features that Ring does not have(like the cruise, PTZ, invert image upside down, etc). I regret not buying this one earlier. And I plan to buy more for my backyard and 2 sides of my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this camera because the one I previously had only worked with a certain type of wifi. We recently had to switch our wifi over and our old camera stopped working. Ordering this camera was the best decision I ever made. It was easy to install (just screw it into the light fixture) outside our home, downloaded the app on the devices we would be using to access it and that was it.The cool thing about this camera is there are several features it has that the old one didn't have. For 1) it has infrared which allows us to still see what is happening at night; 2) there is a 2-way speaker that not only allows me to talk to the person in view of the camera but they can also speak back to me; 3) It has motion detection alerts. You can set it to where the siren goes off anytime there is human detection; and 4) It has uninterrupted recording which you can change over to event recording if you prefer.The visual is very clear in the day and night. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a little extra security. We have a regular security system but we are using this one to cover the blindspot that is not picked up by our other camera system. Great investment and great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great ! The set up is very simple and can be completed in 5 minutes or less. I love the fact that you can control the camera at a 360 angle from you phone and with each motion and or sound you will get alerts. The camera also works great as a motion sensor light as well. I will be getting another one for the rear of our home, Excellent product I recommend to all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This camera failed me when I needed it the most!
reviews.reviewText: At first I was impressed with this camera because of all the different features and settings but the problem is when you go to purchase iCloud storage. My car was badly vandalized by someone that the police have been advising me to get a restraining order against. I had already purchased continuous recoding and Cloud storage but I wasn’t able to playback the footage from the night before, it just said “Buy” and redirected me to a page where you can pay for 7-day playback. I paid and it charged me twice and I STILL cannot access the much needed footage that I need for the police! I’ve emailed for support and nobody is getting back to me. Thank god I had a Blink camera set up that showed the perpetrator lurking around my property in the middle of the night but I cannot access the footage where car is being vandalized because clearly the the cloud storage thing is a scam. Maybe it works better with an SD card but I can’t risk it, I also noticed the “event” alert is not 100% reliable and does not go off every time a human passes by. Overall very disappointed in this product, the bad far outweighs the good and I have yet to hear back from anyone. If you sincerely feel your life is at risk and need a good camera, do not take a gamble on this one please, it’s not worth the stress and agony!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This light bulb camera is exactly what I wanted!!
reviews.reviewText: If you want an easy camera that anyone can install and use, then this is what you need to get! Not only is it easy to install, it actually works!! The picture is Crystal clear for both night and day and the set up takes less than 10 minutes. I am very satisfied with this purchase and have already recommended it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Easy!
reviews.reviewText: This product is so simple to install, and very easy to sync with your internet connection. The video is high quality, and does not require one to purchase a plan. The camera comes with a SD card slot; just purchase a card and install for video storage. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was a little wonky to get the app configured to the device but eventually it paired up. Picture quality is good, motion detection is also good , no MT card so I'll need to order on to fit so I can review any recordings made via motion detection. Can't really complain for the cost , overall I'd say it's a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my brother's house. I am very glad that I chose these, they work great. The clarity and function of the cameras are top notch. They were easy to set up and install. I would recommend them to anyone else that is looking for cameras. I would definitely purchase again 100%
